This is a simple Login Message class that creates a login message after the user has successfully entered the correct username amd password.

This is a simple enum for the option the user has for choosing a cipher.

This is a simple OptionMessage Message class that allows users to choose their cipher option.
PlayfairCipher
PlayfairCipher class is used for encrypting/decrypting text using the Playfair Cipher method.

This is a simple server class for exchanging Message objects with a client.
TextMessage
This is a simple text message class for the 'text message' message type.
VignereCipher
VignereCipher is a class created for encrypting and decrypting text using the Vignere cipher method.
